content: Does anyone else experience random freezes when installing packages that suddenly get fixed when you press enter? I see my cpu usage go to 0% while the process is frozen, and it will stay there indefinitely until I press enter. So far, I have been unable to reproduce the issue, it just appears to randomly happen.
This happens to me somewhat frequently in VS code, but never running stuff in the REPL directly...
Are you on windows? It happens for me there, but never on Linux
WSL, so that may be causing the problem.
